email_body: will see you there (most probably) From: Kim Ward/ENRON@enronXgate on 05/04/2001 10:18 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: RE: My floor looks good - now i just have to paint. Have fun in San Antonio. Monday morning? -----Original Message----- From: Arnold, John Sent: Friday, May 04, 2001 9:38 AM To: Ward, Kim S. Subject: Re: i like that feeling...as long as someone doesnt punch you in the gut. i'm going to san antonio at lunch today to play soccer so i just took the day off. catching up on 2 weeks of email. i know how to relax don't i From: Kim Ward/ENRON@enronXgate on 05/04/2001 09:34 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Every single muscle in my stomach is sore.
